title: 820-2936 b no green light, no amber light, no fan spin water damage
message:
I have no clue where to start, I got lucky by having a few donor boards for my last jobs and was able to just swap out clearly damaged parts. Where should I start for this one?
kind regards

title: 820-2936 b no green light, no amber light, no fan spin water damage
message:
Voltage on PP3V42_G3H???? 
Voltage on PPBUS_G3H???
Where is water damage??

title: 820-2936 b no green light, no amber light, no fan spin water damage
message:
I can say that most of the water damage is over by J6700 and J3500, or at least I hope I am correctly telling you. C3577 looked really terrible so I pulled that. I don't think I am supposed to ask this but I have tried finding it online about how to measure PP3V42_G3H and PPBUS_G3H but I am not sure. If I measure PP3V42_G3H at L6995 then it is 3.478.  If I can measure ppbus_g3h on F9700 then it is 12.26.
I hope this is right info I am giving you. This is my first real try to fix a board.

title: 820-2936 b no green light, no amber light, no fan spin water damage
message: PPBUS at 12.23 means SMC is not running. Is SMC_RESET_L high? Is SMC_BC_ACOK high?

title: 820-2936 b no green light, no amber light, no fan spin water damage
message: SMC_RESET_L = 3.429     SMC_BC_ACOK =3.25 but jumps around a lot not going over 3.2 or under 3.24

title: 820-2936 b no green light, no amber light, no fan spin water damage
message: Looks like dead SMC or crap under it. Try some flux and heat but do not reflow. If that does not help replace it.

title: 820-2936 b no green light, no amber light, no fan spin water damage
message:
ok, I also did not ultrasonic it yet, should I also perform that step?
kind regards

title: 820-2936 b no green light, no amber light, no fan spin water damage
820-2936 b no green light, no amber light, no fan spin water damage
message: nothing after heating, but after ultrasonic=green light and fan spin!! Thanks so much Duke and everyone who helped me!
